name: Super Fast (Thulkrast)
description:
Super Fast - a game created for Beginner Friendly Game Jam. 

The production of this game reached prototype phase as the only time I could work on this project was in my free time after full-time job.

How to play: 

  • Select two neighbouring gems to swap their places
  • To add new row press "SPACE"
  • if you match 3 or more in row / column the gems will be destroyed
  • Destroying gems adds score and increases time left
  • if either time reaches 0 or there is no place to add new row - the game will end

This is my first game that has been "finished". I used this opportunity to learn different styles of pixel art

P.S. Constructive criticism is encouraged as this will help me grow :)

P.S.2 Most of my sound effects were obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com - This is not a promotion link. I am legaly obliged to give credit to the creator.
